    • Method Detail

      • isValidNick

        private boolean isValidNick()
        Validates the nick the user enters into the input field. The nick supposed to be a one word only.
        Returns:
        true if the nick is valid, false otherwise

      • isValidIP

        private boolean isValidIP()
        Validates the ip address the user enters into the input field. The ip address is supposed to be an IPv4 format.
        Returns:
        true, if the ip address is a valid IPv4 format, false otherwise

      • isValidPortNumber

        private boolean isValidPortNumber()
        Validates the port number the user enters into the input field. The port is supposed to be an integer 0-65535
        Returns:
        true, if the port is valid, false otherwise

      • connectToServer

        private void connectToServer()
        Connects to the server. If all the input fields are fill out correctly, the program will start attempting connecting to the server. Otherwise, an error message will be thrown.

      • createButtonItem

        private javafx.scene.control.Button createButtonItem()
        Creates the button the user is supposed to click on when they wan to connect to the server.
        Returns:
        button connect

      • createPortNumberItem

        private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createPortNumberItem()
        Creates the port number items
        Returns:
        hBox containing all the items regarding entering the port number

      • createIPAddrItem

        private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createIPAddrItem()
        Creates the ip address items.
        Returns:
        hBox containing all the items regarding entering the ip address

      • createNickItem

        private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createNickItem()
        Creates the nick items.
        Returns:
        hBox containing all the items regarding entering the nick name

      • createTitle

        private javafx.scene.control.Label createTitle()
        Creates the tile of the window
        Returns:
        the tile of the window
